content: new year new you new yoga mat bag this bag is worked in the round from the bottom up and features an openwork body pattern drawstring closure and integrated strap materials as written 350 yards 320 meters /160 grams washable worsted weight yarn such as berroco vintage in two colors approximately 80 grams each solid variation 350 yards 320 meters /160 grams washable worsted weight yarn such as berroco vintage in one color see variations scrap variation pictured 350 yards 320 meters /160 grams washable worsted weight yarn such as berroco vintage in any number of colors see variations 16 40 cm circular or double pointed needles size 6 4 mm or size needed to obtain gauge stitch marker tapestry needle to weave in ends optional longer circular or waste yarn for size checks size approximately 16 inch 40 cm circumference 26 inches 66 cm tall gauge 6 stitches per inch 2 5 cm in stockinette stitch gauge is not critical
